elements.heading: Smil Raj Thakur
elements.content: Software Engineer | Passionate about crafting innovative solutions and driving impactful results. Expertise in full-stack development with a focus on C#, Python, and TypeScript.

elements.heading: Skills Showcase
elements.content: A diverse skillset honed through academic excellence and professional experience.

elements.heading: Languages Proficiency
elements.content: Expertise in C#, Python, TypeScript, Java, Swift, SQL, Dart, C++, demonstrating a versatile coding foundation.

elements.heading: Frameworks Expertise
elements.content: Proficient in .NET, Angular, React.js, Node.js, HTML, CSS, Flutter, Swift UI, Native iOS Development, enabling full-stack capabilities.

elements.heading: Experience Timeline
elements.content: A journey of continuous growth and impactful contributions in the software engineering landscape.

elements.heading: Project Spotlights
elements.content: Showcasing innovation and problem-solving through diverse project experiences.

innerBentos.heading: Clippy - Cross-Platform Smart Search Butler
innerBentos.content: Developed a cross-platform AI desktop assistant with intelligent agent capabilities.

innerBentos.heading: DayFlow - Team Calendar & Schedule Manager
innerBentos.content: Built a responsive team calendar system with secure authentication and real-time collaboration.

innerBentos.heading: JustDrop
innerBentos.content: Engineered a cross-device file-sharing web application with a drag-and-drop interface.

elements.heading: Clippy - Tech Stack
elements.content: Utilizing Python, Flet, Gemini API, Agno Agent, and Asyncio to create an intelligent desktop assistant.

elements.heading: DayFlow - Tech Stack
elements.content: Leveraging React, TypeScript, Supabase, Vite, and Tailwind for a seamless team calendar experience.

elements.heading: JustDrop - Tech Stack
elements.content: Implementing React.js, Tailwind CSS, and Firebase for secure and efficient file sharing.
